text: What are benefits of CategoricalArrays vs simple Array of `@enum` type?

elements.text: What are benefits of CategoricalArrays vs simple Array of

text: You can combine CategoricalArrays to get one with all the categories. You can add new categories to an existing CategoricalArray. And, they support  `missing`.

text: You would have to manage the `@enum`s in an Array of them.  For example, CategoricalArrays have an `ordered` attribute that is internalized.

text: Also enums force the compiler to recompile all methods to specialize on their type, so that introduces a lot of latency, especially if you have many arrays with different categories.
